org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington

div1.p: United States District Court for the Western District of Washington

In the Matter of the the application of Gladys Fredrika Fuson for a Writ of Habeas Corpus
vs}
To the Clerk of the above Entitled Court:

You will please enter our appearance as attorney for Respondent in the above entitled cause, and service of all subsequent papers, except writs and process, may be made upon said Repondent, by leaving the same with Alfred H Lundin, Frank P Helsell

Office Adress 431 City & County Bldg
Seattle Wash,
NOTICE- Attorneys will please endorse thier own Filings, Rule 11
United States District Court Western District of Washington

FILED IN THE U.S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington NORTHERN DIVISION
OCT 27 1916
FRANK L. CROSBY, CLERK
Edm Lakin DEPUTY
